about_the_game:
This DOLOS approved digital artbook will take you through the artistic development of IXION. The art team of Bulwark have curated pieces from concept to realization, interspersed with commentary about the choices they made.

Witness the journey from idea to reality across multiple chapters, with artwork of characters, buildings, the station itself and more included!

Once downloaded, you can access the artbook in your local files under: \Steam\steamapps\common\Stanford\Artbook
detailed_description:
This DOLOS approved digital artbook will take you through the artistic development of IXION. The art team of Bulwark have curated pieces from concept to realization, interspersed with commentary about the choices they made.

Witness the journey from idea to reality across multiple chapters, with artwork of characters, buildings, the station itself and more included!

Once downloaded, you can access the artbook in your local files under: \Steam\steamapps\common\Stanford\Artbook

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10-compatible graphics card with at least 1GB of video memory
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 1536
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
